title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7870.8 - Notice to emergency agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7870.8 - Notice to emergency agency

State Regulations
(a) Every distributor shall immediately notify by telephone the designated
emergency agency listed in Appendix BB-7 of this Title for the municipality or
county in which the residential building affected is located, if notification
to a social services district office is required under section
7870.7
(a) of this

Part, and two attempts to contact the social services district office are
unsuccessful. If initial attempts are unsuccessful, every distributor shall
continue to call until the emergency agency is contacted. (b) When the emergency agency is contacted, the distributor shall provide the emergency agency with the same notification
the social services district office would receive. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7870.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
